details.description_text: পলিপ্রোপিলিন উপাদান দিয়ে তৈরি, টেকসই ব্যবহারের জন্য অ্যান্টি-জারা।টেলিস্কোপিক এবং ঘূর্ণনযোগ্য নকশা, ব্যবহারে নমনীয়।নিখুঁত সময় সাশ্রয় এবং রান্নাঘরে শক্তি বাঁচাতে সাহায্য করে।সহজ ইনস্টলেশন, আরামদায়ক ব্যবহারের জন্য অপসারণযোগ্য অগ্রভাগ।পাখার ব্লেড দিয়ে ডিজাইন করা, জল বাঁচাতে নিখুঁত ট্যাপ নজল।সেরা জল সংরক্ষণকারী. কলের অগ্রভাগ ফিল্টারটি পিপি এবং উচ্চ-মানের পিভিসি উপাদান দিয়ে তৈরি, শক্তিশালী এবং পরিধান-প্রতিরোধী।, এটি জলের পাইপে মরিচা শোষণ করতে পারে।Bpa, Pvc, বা Phthalates ছাড়া ফুড গ্রেড সামগ্রী।পরিমাণ: 1 ইউনিট।বৈশিষ্ট্য: টেলিস্কোপিক, 360-ডিগ্রী ঘূর্ণন, জল-সংরক্ষণ, অপসারণযোগ্য।আকার: 1.8 '' x 2.8 '' (প্রায়)।Made of polypropylene material, anti-corrosion for durable use.Telescopic and rotatable design, flexible to use.Perfect time saving and help save strength in the kitchen.Easy installation, removable nozzle for comfortable use.Designed with fan blades, perfect tap nozzle to save water.Best Water Saver. The faucet nozzle filter is made of PP and high-quality PVC material, strong and wear-resistant., it can absorb rust in water pipe.Food Grade Materials Without Bpa, Pvc, Or Phthalates.Quantity: 1 unit.Features: telescopic, 360-degree rotation, water-saving, removable.Size: 1.8 '' x 2.8 '' (Approx).

details.description_text: ডেলীভারী শর্তসমূহ: ঢাকা শহরের বাহিরে হলে আপনার নিকটস্থ সুন্দরবন কুরিয়ার থেকে পণ্যটি সংগ্রহ করে নিতে হবে। ঢাকা শহরের বাহিরে হোম ডেলীভারী প্রযোজ্য নহে। Code : RKS NB 36 Inch Size (L x W x H): 36"x18"x9" Brand Rizco Color : Black High Quality Stainless Steel SUS304 Hand Made Kitchen Sink Nano Black Finish Collar Thickness 3mm Bowl Thickness 0.8mm Quality Padding Life Long Shine Scratch Free Including Accessories: Soap Dispenser, Knife Holder, Basket, Cutting Board Holder & Drainer Stylish and Functional Kitchen Sinks for Modern Homes RizcoUpgrade your kitchen with our stylish and functional kitchen sinks. Explore our wide range of high-quality sinks designed to enhance the aesthetics and functionality of your modern home. Choose from various sizes, materials, and configurations to find the perfect kitchen sink that suits your needs.Introduction:Elevate your kitchen's style and functionality with Rizco's collection of premium kitchen sinks. Our range is thoughtfully designed to bring a perfect blend of aesthetics and practicality to your modern home. With a variety of sizes, materials, and configurations available, you can easily find the ideal kitchen sink that matches your unique requirements and personal style.Key Features and Benefits:Exceptional Durability: Crafted from high-quality materials such as stainless steel our kitchen sinks are built to withstand daily use and resist scratches, stains, and heat. Enjoy long-lasting performance and a sink that stays looking new for years to come.Versatile Configurations: Our kitchen sinks come in a range of configurations including single bowl, double bowl, farmhouse, and undermount options. Whether you need ample space for food prep or separate compartments for multitasking, our sinks offer versatile solutions to suit your specific needs.Stylish Designs: Add a touch of elegance and style to your kitchen with our visually appealing sink designs. From sleek and modern to timeless and traditional, we offer a wide selection of styles and finishes to complement any kitchen décor.Functional Accessories: Enhance the functionality of your kitchen sink with our range of accessories. Choose from cutting boards, colanders, drying racks, and sink grids that are custom-fit for our sinks, providing convenience and organization during food preparation and cleanup.Easy Maintenance: Our kitchen sinks are designed for easy cleaning and maintenance, minimizing your effort and time spent on upkeep. The non-porous surfaces and smooth finishes of our sinks resist staining and make wiping away dirt and grime a breeze.Noise Reduction Technology: Enjoy a quieter kitchen experience with our sinks featuring noise reduction technology. Sound-absorbing pads or coatings on the sink's underside help minimize noise from water flow and utensil impact, creating a more peaceful environment.Easy Installation: Our kitchen sinks are designed for straightforward installation, whether you're a DIY enthusiast or working with a professional installer. Clear instructions and compatible mounting hardware ensure a hassle-free setup process.Conclusion:Transform your kitchen into a stylish and functional space with Rizco's range of high-quality kitchen sinks. With exceptional durability, versatile configurations, and stylish designs, our sinks are perfect for modern homes. Enjoy the convenience of functional accessories, easy maintenance, and eco-friendly options. Upgrade your kitchen today and find the perfect sink that combines aesthetics and functionality seamlessly.

547343112.name: 6 Layers Tap Purifier Universal Faucet Tap Filter Splashproof 360 Degree Rotation Water Saving Bubbler for Home Kitchen Bathroom

details.description_text: 6 Layers Tap Purifier Universal Faucet Tap Filter Splashproof 360 Degree Rotation Water Saving Bubbler for Home Kitchen BathroomBurbujeador de ahorro de agua de 6 capas a prueba de salpicaduras 360° Mezclador de boquilla contra salpicaduras de rotación, burbujeador Universal para el hogar, cocina y bañoCaracterísticas:1. Diseño de protector contra salpicaduras:Evita salpicaduras de agua con la salida de agua bien distribuida del filtro de agua que dispersa la presión del agua de manera efectiva, manteniendo el área de su cocina seca y limpia.La densa distribución de las salidas de agua minimiza la fuerza del flujo de agua, evitando salpicaduras y garantizando una experiencia sin complicaciones.2.Filtración Natural:Utiliza materiales minerales naturales para absorber las impurezas y purificar el agua, brindando agua más limpia y saludable para el uso diario.El cartucho purificador de grifo elaborado con minerales naturales elimina eficazmente los contaminantes, proporcionándole agua purificada que tiene un sabor excelente y es segura para su consumo.3.Flexible y giratorio:Equipado con un diseño flexible y giratorio de 360 grados, lo que hace que el aireador del grifo sea increíblemente conveniente y versátil para tareas de limpieza en múltiples ángulos.Disfrute de la libertad de girar y posicionar el cabezal del filtro en cualquier dirección, lo que le permite limpiar sin esfuerzo áreas difíciles de alcanzar y abordar diversas necesidades de limpieza con facilidad.4.Fácil instalación:Compatible con casi todos los tipos de grifos, este filtro para grifo es extremadamente fácil de instalar en su grifo existente sin necesidad de complicaciones ni herramientas adicionales.Diseñado para adaptarse a la mayoría de los grifos estándar, el proceso de instalación es simple y directo, lo que garantiza una configuración rápida para que pueda comenzar a disfrutar de agua filtrada inmediatamente.5. Materiales de primera calidad:Fabricado con materiales duraderos y de alta calidad, este filtro de grifo está diseñado para durar manteniendo su funcionalidad y rendimiento.Fabricado con materiales seguros y duraderos, el filtro es resistente al desgaste, lo que garantiza un uso duradero y resultados de filtración óptimos.Adecuado tanto para agua fría como caliente, recomendamos utilizar agua por debajo de 60 grados centígrados para una mayor longevidad.Especificación:Certificación: NINGUNOOrigen: China continentalMaterial: PP, PVC, piedra médica, tela no tejida, carbón activado, etc.Color: rosa, verde, azul, blancoTamaño: 12*3cm/4,72*1,18 pulgadasFunciones: antisalpicaduras, purificación de agua, extensión.Nota:Debido a los diferentes monitores y efectos de la luz, el color real del artículo puede ser ligeramente diferente al color mostrado en las imágenes.¡Gracias!Permita una desviación de medición de 1-2 cm debido a la medición manual.1x filtro de agua

details.description_text: Universal 1080° Rotatable Faucet Aerator Kitchen Tap Adapter with Splash Plastic Filter Extend Water Nozzle for 22/24mm FaucetsDual Effluent Universal 1080° Rotation Extender Faucet Aerator Plastic Splash Filter Kitchen Washbasin Faucets Bubbler Nozzle Robotic ArmFeature:【Rotating Filter Faucet 】The splash filter faucet adds air into the water stream, making it oxygen-rich and resulting in a wider spray of water that does not splash all over and feels soothing on the skin. Unlike a standard faucet extender, the faucet sprayer attachment can rotate 1080 degrees【Water Spray Modes】 This sink sprayer attachment for the faucet features two water outflow rotatory switch modes, a soft bubble stream, and a strong spray. With its strong water spray mode, our sink aerator cleans effectively while minimizing water splash, allowing you to avoid soaking your shirt while washing your hands.【Easy to Install】Sink faucet sprayer attachment is easy to set up and maintain, and it's a great long-term option for filtering water. Simply unscrew the aerator from the threaded tip of the faucet and replace it with this 1080 rotatable faucet. Please measure the faucet diameter before purchase.【Durable in Use】Our basin bathroom faucet aerator is made up of high-quality brass, giving your sink faucet a premium appearance. The features of this sink sprayer attachment are precise and well finished. It has an ABS body for added strength making it perfect for long-term use.【Use in Multiple Scenarios】Faucet extenders for bathroom sink suitable for 99% of faucets. Four-layer filter element filters remove impurities in the water. Double gasket anti-drip. It can be used in the kitchen to rinse vegetables and fruits, dishes, sinks, etc. It can also be used for daily washing in the bathroom, shampooing, washing towels, etc.Specifications:Material: ABS PlasticProduct color: silverProduct interface size:Inner diameter: 22mmOuter diameter: 24mmPackage Included:1pc* 1080° Faucet Robotic Arm

details.description_text: পলিপ্রোপিলিন উপাদান দিয়ে তৈরি, টেকসই ব্যবহারের জন্য অ্যান্টি-জারা।টেলিস্কোপিক এবং ঘূর্ণনযোগ্য নকশা, ব্যবহারে নমনীয়। নিখুঁত সময় সাশ্রয় এবং রান্নাঘরে শক্তি বাঁচাতে সাহায্য করে। সহজ ইনস্টলেশন, আরামদায়ক ব্যবহারের জন্য অপসারণযোগ্য অগ্রভাগ। পাখার ব্লেড দিয়ে ডিজাইন করা, জল বাঁচাতে নিখুঁত ট্যাপ নজল। সেরা জল সংরক্ষণকারী. কলের অগ্রভাগ ফিল্টারটি পিপি এবং উচ্চ-মানের পিভিসি উপাদান দিয়ে তৈরি, শক্তিশালী এবং পরিধান-প্রতিরোধী।, এটি জলের পাইপে মরিচা শোষণ করতে পারে। Bpa, Pvc, বা Phthalates ছাড়া ফুড গ্রেড সামগ্রী। পরিমাণ: 1 ইউনিট। বৈশিষ্ট্য: টেলিস্কোপিক, 360-ডিগ্রী ঘূর্ণন, জল-সংরক্ষণ, অপসারণযোগ্য। আকার: 1.8 '' x 2.8 '' (প্রায়)। Made of polypropylene material, anti-corrosion for durable use.Telescopic and rotatable design, flexible to use.Perfect time saving and help save strength in the kitchen.Easy installation, removable nozzle for comfortable use.Designed with fan blades, perfect tap nozzle to save water.Best Water Saver. The faucet nozzle filter is made of PP and high-quality PVC material, strong and wear-resistant., it can absorb rust in water pipe.Food Grade Materials Without Bpa, Pvc, Or Phthalates.Quantity: 1 unit.Features: telescopic, 360-degree rotation, water-saving, removable.Size: 1.8 '' x 2.8 '' (Approx).

details.description_text: **Highlights of a Hot Water Tap for the Kitchen:**- **Instant Hot Water**: No waiting time for hot water—perfect for quick meal prep, cleaning, and drinks.- **Convenient**: Eliminates the need for a kettle or microwave to heat water.- **Energy Efficient**: Uses a small, dedicated heater to reduce energy waste.- **Space-Saving**: Frees up counter space by replacing bulky kettles and pots.- **Enhanced Safety**: Many models come with child-safe locks to prevent accidental burns.- **Stylish Options**: Available in various designs to complement kitchen decor.- **Eco-Friendly**: Reduces water waste by delivering heated water immediately.A hot water tap in the kitchen is a convenient fixture that provides instant access to hot water directly from the faucet. Unlike traditional taps, which take time to heat water, a hot water tap is typically connected to a small, dedicated water heater, ensuring immediate hot water whenever needed. This feature is incredibly useful for cooking, cleaning, and preparing hot beverages without waiting for water to heat on the stove. Hot water taps are often designed with safety mechanisms, such as child locks, to prevent accidental burns. They’re available in various styles and finishes, making it easy to match any kitchen decor while adding both functionality and efficiency.

details.description_text: পলিপ্রোপিলিন উপাদান দিয়ে তৈরি, টেকসই ব্যবহারের জন্য অ্যান্টি-জারা। টেলিস্কোপিক এবং ঘূর্ণনযোগ্য নকশা, ব্যবহারে নমনীয়। নিখুঁত সময় সাশ্রয় এবং রান্নাঘরে শক্তি বাঁচাতে সাহায্য করে। সহজ ইনস্টলেশন, আরামদায়ক ব্যবহারের জন্য অপসারণযোগ্য অগ্রভাগ। পাখার ব্লেড দিয়ে ডিজাইন করা, জল বাঁচাতে নিখুঁত ট্যাপ নজল। সেরা জল সংরক্ষণকারী. কলের অগ্রভাগ ফিল্টারটি পিপি এবং উচ্চ-মানের পিভিসি উপাদান দিয়ে তৈরি, শক্তিশালী এবং পরিধান-প্রতিরোধী।, এটি জলের পাইপে মরিচা শোষণ করতে পারে। Bpa, Pvc, বা Phthalates ছাড়া ফুড গ্রেড সামগ্রী। পরিমাণ: 1 ইউনিট। বৈশিষ্ট্য: টেলিস্কোপিক, 360-ডিগ্রী ঘূর্ণন, জল-সংরক্ষণ, অপসারণযোগ্য। আকার: 1.8 '' x 2.8 '' (প্রায়)। Made of polypropylene material, anti-corrosion for durable use.Telescopic and rotatable design, flexible to use.Perfect time saving and help save strength in the kitchen.Easy installation, removable nozzle for comfortable use.Designed with fan blades, perfect tap nozzle to save water.Best Water Saver. The faucet nozzle filter is made of PP and high-quality PVC material, strong and wear-resistant., it can absorb rust in water pipe.Food Grade Materials Without Bpa, Pvc, Or Phthalates.Quantity: 1 unit.Features: telescopic, 360-degree rotation, water-saving, removable.Size: 1.8 '' x 2.8 '' (Approx).

details.description_text: Upgraded Black Silver Pull Out Kitchen Faucet Dual Mode Telescopic Rotary Stainless Steel Hot Cold Water Faucet for KitchenPremium Stainless Steel Pull-Out Kitchen Faucet – Durable, Stylish, and Highly FunctionalUpgrade your kitchen with our sleek and durable stainless steel pull-out faucet, designed for ultimate convenience and modern style. Perfect for remodeling projects, new installations, or upgrading an existing kitchen fixture. Experience the precision, flexibility, and elegance of a high-quality kitchen faucet designed for today’s modern lifestyles.

Just take out the old sink drain stopper and insert the bouncing core.Package Included:1 Bathroom Sink Drain Stopper

Please measure the faucet diameter before purchase.【Use in Multiple Scenarios】Faucet extenders for bathroom sink suitable for 99% of faucets. Four-layer filter element filters remove impurities in the water. Double gasket anti-drip. It can be used in the kitchen to rinse vegetables and fruits, dishes, sinks, etc. It can also be used for daily washing in the bathroom, shampooing, washing towels, etc.

details.raw_text: 2Set Kitchen Sink Strainer With Handle & Stopper Replacement Drain Basket Stainless Steel Mesh Filter Waste HoleThe kitchen sink filter with handle and stopper features are as follows:Easy operation: Equipped with a handle design, it is easy for users to take and move the filter, and the operation is more convenient.Splash stoppers: Specially designed stoppers can effectively prevent water from splashing out of the sink and keep the kitchen clean and tidy.Effective filtration: A reasonably designed filter or pore can effectively filter impurities, residue, food residue, etc., in the water to ensure the quality of water.Anti-blocking: The anti-blocking design can effectively reduce the blockage of the sink sewer and keep the water flow smooth.Durable material: stainless steel, with strong durability, not easy to deformation or damage.Easy to clean: the surface is smooth and smooth, easy to clean, and can be washed or wiped with water to keep the filter clean and sanitary.Simple installation: Easy to install, usually by placing the filter at the sink drain, without the need for professional tools or technical support.Wide applicability: It is suitable for various types of kitchen sinks, which can meet the needs of different users, and is one of the important accessories for kitchen hygiene and cleaning.Environmental protection and health: The use of environmentally friendly non-toxic materials, no pollution to water quality, to ensure water safety.Affordable: moderate price, low cost, economic benefits, is one of the economic and effective ways to protect water quality.In summary, the kitchen sink filter with handle and stopper provides a reliable solution for kitchen water filtration and cleaning with its convenient operation, anti-splash stopper, effective filtration, anti-clogging, durable, easy to clean, easy to install, wide applicability, environmental health and economic benefits.Specifications: One
